attributes.action: Make St. George's Day a public holiday for those who wish to celbrate it. Or at least let us celebrate St. George's Day, without being proclaimed as 'racist'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make St. George's Day a public holiday in England, or at least let us celebrate it without being labelled as 'racist'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
